name: Dig Dog (itch) (Martin Asteasuain)
description:
Here’s my submission for Ludum Dare #48 The game was inspired by classics like Boulder Dash or Supaplex, but with little differences.

You're a dog and you love to dig… so dig! the deeper you dig, the bigger the score!

My plan was to make a mobile game, but i didn’t finish it on time… so here’s web and desktop versions (mobile is in the works!)

CREDITS:

Art and Programming
Martin Asteasuain
